context: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system, located in the Coral Sea off the coast of Queensland, Australia. It is composed of over 2,900 individual reefs and 900 islands.
Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and support for multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming.
The Eiffel Tower, constructed in 1889 as the entrance arch for the World's Fair in Paris, stands 324 meters tall and is one of the most recognizable structures in the world.
Renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and hydroelectric power are becoming increasingly important in reducing global greenhouse gas emissions and combating climate change.
Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics, which transformed our understanding of space, time, and gravity.
